news.headline: ITC Q3 FY25 Results: Net Profit Declines 7% to ₹4,935 Crore
news.text: ITC Ltd reported a 7% year-on-year decline in consolidated net profit for Q3 FY25, amounting to ₹4,935 crore. This decrease is attributed to subdued demand and increased input costs. However, revenue from operations grew by 8% to ₹20,350 crore. The company declared an interim dividend of ₹6.5 per share.

news.headline: ITC Share Price Sees Positive Movement Amid Market Volatility
news.text: On May 12, 2025, ITC's share price experienced a 2.37% increase, trading at ₹433.55. This uptick comes despite a three-month return of -0.85%, indicating resilience amid market fluctuations. The stock's 3-day exponential moving average stands at ₹420.82.

news.headline: ITC Board to Consider Q4 FY25 Results and Final Dividend on May 22
news.text: ITC Ltd has announced that its board will meet on May 22, 2025, to consider and approve the financial results for Q4 FY25 and the fiscal year ending March 2025. The board will also deliberate on the recommendation of a final dividend for the fiscal year.

news.headline: ITC Shares Slightly Decline but Outperform Competitors
news.text: On May 8, 2025, ITC's shares marginally declined by 0.07% to close at ₹430.35, outperforming competitors like Golden Tobacco Ltd and Godfrey Phillips India Ltd, which saw more significant drops. ITC's stock remains 13.75% below its 52-week high of ₹498.94.
